message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $13,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a price that reflects its true worth while offering you a significant discount compared to its market value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, that price point is a bit high for my budget.  Would you consider $10,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your budget constraints, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to offer the product for $11,500. This still maintains a fair profit margin for us while being more accessible to your current budget.

Hi Alice, thanks for working with me. I appreciate the movement on the price. To be upfront, I do have another offer for $12,000. To make a deal work today, would you be willing to come down to that price?
